description:
In an attempt to get the Prism Stones from Nagisa, dark warrior from Dotsuku Zone, Pisard poses as a new student teacher at Verone Academy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beware of the Cute Student Teacher
Iketeru Jisshusei ni Ki o Tsukero!
ระวังอาจารย์สอนสุดหล่อเอาไว้ให้ดีเถอะ
イケてる実習生に気をつけろ!
